channel.title: What are the dupes on Dueling?
channel.description:
guys, can anyone tell me what kinds of dupe there are on dueling, because i forgot it.
I AM NOT doing it, I'm GOING TO TRY FIXING IT.. so don't say " dude, you're just going to dupe so gtfo here "

item.title: What are the dupes on Dueling?
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

That’s not dueling now =S that’s why i’m trying to fix it. So we can still duel, but no duping

Read full topic

item.title: What are the dupes on Dueling?
item.dc:creator: @The_True_Hero The True Hero
item.description:
@The_True_Hero wrote:

Here it is:

[center]Duping when dueling:[/center]
First step, right click another player and select the option duel.
Second step, both players or one of the players (depending on if you want anything back besides what you put up initially) put up the items they would normally stake.
Third step, both accept the stakes and begin the duel.
Final step, when the duel begins click the option ‘report abuse’ on the bottom of the screen (not the page guys… the webclient or client screen = what you are actually playing the game on sheesh…). When the screen that would normally pop up appears, take a step or exit out of it. You will have all of the staked items for it assumes you won the duel. If the other player also does this glitch it will assume he won too. You both will end up with all of the staked items.

Congratz Guys, you have just broken the rules and duped! Sarcasim definetly

Yours Truly,
Hero

P.S. I truly hope you won’t go and use this on people’s servers…

Read full topic
item.source: What are the dupes on Dueling?

item.title: What are the dupes on Dueling?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

When your in a duel, and you begin, before you fight, click the “report abuse” button, or say any command that brings up a menu, and you will automatically win your opponents staked items, and get yours back.

Also one with dueling + Banking at the same time, which I think is fixed on devolution 7.0

Read full topic
item.source: What are the dupes on Dueling?
